did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Fort Pickens, Winchester, Virginia, Civil War Letter, 1861
did.abstract: The Fort Pickens, Winchester, Virginia, Civil War Letter concerns the creator, "GHD", telling his wife, Lizzie, that he has arrived in Winchester following a recent skirmish and local regimental activities.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Fort Pickens, Winchester, Virginia, Civil War Letter must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Fort Pickens, Winchester, Virginia, Civil War Letter, Ms2019-004, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Fort Pickens, Winchester, Virginia, Civil War Letter was purchased by Special Collections in 2018.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Fort Pickens, Winchester, Virginia, Civil War Letter was completed in January 2019.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Fort Pickens, Winchester, Virginia, Civil War Letter concerns the creator, "GHD", telling his wife, Lizzie, that he has arrived in Winchester following a recent skirmish, likely the Skirmish of Falling Waters. He also talks about local regimental activities. The letter is dated July 6, 1861.
